
# Repository Title

The repository focuses on providing practical and efficient solutions for various cryptographic tasks and protocols. The codebase implementations (c++) of commonly used cryptographic algorithms.



## Appendix

All code implementation use crypto++ library in c++ programming language.


## Install Crypto++ library in Ubuntu
step-1: open terminal and run following command.

step-2: Update the package list:

```bash
  sudo apt update
```

step-3: Install the Crypto++ library:

```bash
  sudo apt install libcrypto++-dev
```

step-4: Compiling a program with:

```bash
  g++ your_program.cpp -o your_program -lcryptopp
```

step-5: Run your code:

```bash
  ./your_program
```
